Queries.AddDailyAntInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.dailyant (DA_ID, DA_Date, DA_FPAmount, DA_SPAmount, NotTaken, DA_Data, TakenDate, DA_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@DA_ID, @DA_Date, @DA_FPAmount, @DA_SPAmount, @NotTaken, @DA_Data, @TakenDate, @DA_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateDailyAntData: UPDATE ct_db.dailyant SET DA_FPAmount, DA_SPAmount, NotTaken, DA_Updt_Person WHERE DA_ID = @DA_ID;
Queries.DeleteDailyAntData: UPDATE ct_db.dailyant SET DA_Data, TakenDate, DA_Del_Person WHERE DA_ID = @DA_ID;
